hooks.command: echo "$TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE '(rm -rf /|sudo rm|DROP TABLE|DELETE FROM|> /dev)' && { echo 'BLOCKED: Dangerous command detected'; exit 1; } || exit 0
FILE=$(echo "$TOOL_INPUT" | jq -r '.file_path // .path // ""'); if echo "$FILE" | grep -qE '(prod|production|\.env)'; then echo "WARNING: Editing production file: $FILE"; fi; exit 0
FILE=$(echo "$TOOL_INPUT" | jq -r '.file_path // .path // ""'); if echo "$FILE" | grep -qE '\.(ts|tsx|js|jsx|json)$'; then npx prettier --write "$FILE" 2>/dev/null || true; fi
FILE=$(echo "$TOOL_INPUT" | jq -r '.file_path // .path // ""'); if echo "$FILE" | grep -qE '\.py$'; then black "$FILE" 2>/dev/null || ruff format "$FILE" 2>/dev/null || true; fi

PostToolUse.comment: Run quick lint check on edited files

hooks.command: FILE=$(echo "$TOOL_INPUT" | jq -r '.file_path // .path // ""'); if echo "$FILE" | grep -qE '\.(ts|tsx|js|jsx)$'; then npx eslint --fix "$FILE" 2>/dev/null || true; fi

Stop.comment: Prompt for knowledge extraction on significant sessions

hooks.command: if [ -n "$CONVERSATION_SUMMARY" ] && echo "$CONVERSATION_SUMMARY" | grep -qiE '(debug|fix|error|issue|problem|solved|discovered)'; then echo 'LEARNING OPPORTUNITY: This session may contain extractable knowledge. Consider running /retrospective or saving insights to ~/.claude/skills/learned/'; fi; exit 0
